author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
Skyrim Anniversary Edition is now available on Nintendo Switch 2! 

Winner of over 200 Game of the Year Awards, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Anniversary Edition returns with a newly enhanced adventure for Nintendo Switch™ 2. It brings the legendary open-world fantasy experience to life like never before, at home or on the go.

Owners of the Anniversary Edition on Nintendo Switch can download the game for free on Nintendo Switch 2, while owners of the base edition on Nintendo Switch can purchase the "Anniversary Upgrade" to then download the game on Nintendo Switch 2. 

This version includes:
• The Complete Skyrim Experience – Dive into the acclaimed base game and the three official expansions: Dawnguard, Hearthfire, and Dragonborn.
• Enhanced for Nintendo Switch™ 2 – Enjoy enhanced resolution, improved load times, and optimized performance (as compared to Nintendo Switch™) that take full advantage of the Nintendo Switch™ 2’s advanced hardware.
• Hundreds of Creation Club Items – Discov
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Reveal Trailer - Skyrim Anniversary Edition

author: Bethesda Softworks
description:
On December 9, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™ marks its first anniversary and we're celebrating with a brand new, FREE Indy skin for all players, no matter what platform they play on. Enjoy the sartorial elegance of the Pankot Palace outfit from Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom™, in-game from today! And don't forget to check out these impressive stats that players have racked up over the last year. WARNING: may contain snakes.
 
Winner of over 90 awards, including D.I.C.E.'s “Adventure Game of the Year”, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle delivers an immersive, cinematic adventure experience that puts you firmly into the boots of the renowned archaeologist. 

ESRB RATING: Teen with Violence, Blood and gore, Mild language, Drug reference
title: One Year of Adventure – Indiana Jones and the Great Circle™

author: Bethesda Softworks

title: Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer - Skyrim Anniversary Edition
